title: CONFERENCES AND HEARINGS
content:

§ 263.61 - Hearings; oral argument or brief; representation cases
§ 263.62 - Hearings; variance between pleadings and proof
§ 263.63 - Hearings; motions; objections
§ 263.64 - Hearings; reopening
§ 263.65 - Hearings; evidence as to transactions had at conferences
§ 263.66 - Decision and order
§ 263.67 - Exceptions to the Board

§ 263.71 - Record in proceedings under section 705

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
